types.section:
{{fr-noun|f}}

# an [[annual]] [[pig]] [[festival]] in Trie-sur-Baïse, southwestern [[France]], involving pig [[race]]s, [[eat]]ing [[contest]]s, etc.
types.html:
pourcailhade f (plural pourcailhades)

  1. an annual pig festival in Trie-sur-Baïse, southwestern France, involving pig races, eating contests, etc.
trans: an annual pig festival in Trie-sur-Baïse, southwestern France, involving pig races, eating contests, etc.
